tips.text: Site of the always excellent Shakespeare in the Park
A must go to theatre. Definitely get a middle seat and enjoy Shakespeare at its most.
If you are lucky enough to win the ticket lottery, it’s such a treat to attend “Shakespeare in the Park” during the summer.
Don’t miss Free Shakespeare in the park
Awesome outside theater with the right price when the weather cooperates.  A gem of NYC living.  Watch out for cameos from local raccoons.

results.name: Levain Bakery – Original Location, 74th St, NYC

tips.text: the cookies are to die for
It’s good 👍 7/10
These aren’t cookies, they’re giant brownies. Still, very decadent & delicious.
Wish they had more options
Warm and best cookies In NYC
A fabulous open aired venue in the middle of Central Park. It’s a treat to see a show here. Recently renovated.
Check out the free summer festival concerts. There is always something interesting taking place there!
Really, really great outdoor venue for concerts. Does it get better than Central Park?! Not really!
Backstreet Boys
Nice venue makes you forget you are in the middle of a large city.
Poor service, long waiting time
The gluten-free buns taste gluten-free, but the burger is so good it's worth it.
Tasty burgers and awesome cookies and cream milkshake. An instant classic for burger lovers.
Shake Shack is truth. Not a fan of the watery concretes tho
The bacon cheese fries are a godsend when you have a hangover
Posh settings and clientele. Olive bread is heavenly. Soups are always a standout. Vitello tonnato is perfection. Excellent coffee and cookies to die for. Expensive.
Really doesn’t make sense to have “brunch” time when the menu has 2 egg dishes and the rest are just dinner entrees and pasta. Not one “sweet” option offered. And no modifications whatsoever. Womp.
v potent espresso martinis ☕️⚡️
This fantastic Italian eatery has been on fabulous upper east side for decades. Food is amazing & coffee is omg good. Visit their palm beach location, it’s just as great with WPB glitter💕
Tuna Panini All’Olio With Marinated Artichokes: a savory selection: chopped, briny artichokes and chunky canned Italian tuna on tender olive oil-infused rolls. “They’re slider-size petite," order 2.
Zsenialis finomsagok.
Knich sandwich c’est magique. Attention très copieux.
The best bagels in town 🔥🙏🏼
Today was an especially good day to shop there. The prepared foods were fresh (and plentiful) and the store was empty!  You’ve gotta love August on the UWS! Summer Mondays are terrif!!
What’s not to love? Everything is delicious, fresh, and it smells amazing in here. Catering was wonderful too.
Absolutely buzzing for brunch on a rainy day - massive portions, quality food, delicious cocktails (and a lovely server!) Worth the hype 🥂
wow so good. plan to order and eat family style, these dishes are MASSIVE
The fried chicken French toast is ridiculous!! The size is enough for like 3 people but it’s actually really delicious! Give it a try. Soap was 7/10 🧼👍
This is at most a 6. I had the Lumber Jack. Their French toast smelled delicious but that’s it. Tasteless unless you add syrup. You are better off having spoons of syrup… Hubby had Lyonnaise: 👎
我要感谢这个地方，他做到了让我现在一看到面包尤其是奶油garlic bread就想吐。
Lots of seating, including a cute little coffee bar, but usually very busy!
Staff amável
Best Starbucks in Manhattan!
Starbucks is always a good place.
Decoration is very cool and  music really chilled. The whole environment makes it a great place to stay for a while!
I am a brownie lover, and their brownie is 10/10; make sure to order. Cute store and friendly staff.
Outstanding cafe
elegant decoration, great latte, but asked to leave in 45 min due to the crowded place, which is bad. not allowed to enjoy myself to the fullest
mid. very disappointed
Beautiful place 💕
The best banana chocolate chip cake in the world 🌎
Challah is delicious. Probably the best bakery in the area.
Great tuna salad and the vegan cauliflower sandwich is amazing.
Babkas. Often sell out by noon.
Really good bakery. I love everything here but especially the cinnamon and raisin babka and the lemon cake.
